about-me: A passionate and dynamic software developer from Turkey since 2011. In my daily life I create and work on websites, mobile applications and personal projects. I always develop myself in programming and interested to learn new technologies. Mainly, I am a back-end developer.

kocaeli-bahcesehir-highschool.title: Private Kocaeli Bahçeşehir Anatolian High School - Turkey

edirne-bahcesehir-highschool.title: Private Edirne Bahçeşehir Anatolian High School - Turkey

iconecwave.title: iConec Wave (Istanbul)
iconecwave.description: We are digitally modernizing the business of customers. Creating serverless apps with the Java programming language. AWS technologies are being used.

kodgemisi.title: Kod Gemisi (Turkey)
kodgemisi.description: We were developing enterprise CRM web application. Kotlin, Micronaut, Hibernate and Docker technologies are used.

general-mobile.title: General Mobile Inc. (Istanbul)
general-mobile.description: During the work, we have been building and developing stock Android applications with 6 other team members. We used mainly Kotlin, Java and GitLab.

iconecwave.title: iConec Wave - Royal Canin
iconecwave.description: Royal Canin is one of our customer. We provide solutions for distribution, veterinary clinic and customer order managements in US, France and Japan continents.

kodgemisi.title: Kod Gemisi - Grispi
kodgemisi.things: Kotlin, Java, Micronaut, Hibernate, Docker, PostgreSQL
kodgemisi.description: We were developing a CRM application like Zendesk. It has support ticket operations and customer relation managements over e-mail, phone and web.

portfolio.title: Portfolio >> duruer.dev
portfolio.description: My small serverless portfolio website which I have created to introduce myself. It supports both Turkish and English languages. It has built in Svelte 3, Netlify, Bootstrap 4 and SvelteKit.

routve.title: Routve
routve.description: An advanced Svelte 3 router library which is based on Page.js library, which supports dynamic and static component import.

pano.title: Pano
pano.things: Svelte, Vue, SASS, Kotlin, MySQL, Vert.x
pano.description: An advanced web platform that comfort your Minecraft server's website needs and supports themes, addons and more features. It has built in Kotlin, Svelte 3 and Vue.

antik-kup.title: Antik Küp
antik-kup.description: A complete Turkish Minecraft MMORPG community server. We have created an unique game in Minecraft for players.
